document.discussion_title: Shots Lubes and Liquids has added two new flavours to their collection!
document.topic_text: English Shots Lubes and Liquids has added two new flavours to their collection! 22.08.2016 | Beneden Leeuwen, The Netherlands ─ Shots Lubes and Liquids is one of the most sophisticated brands in the Shots line-up. It contains a delay gel, a numbing gel, and an erection gel. Also, there are regular water-based lubricants and water-based lubricants for anal use. On top of that they feature male and female pheromone lubricants, several deliciously flavoured lubricants and four different crackling body foams! For Shots’ most recent release they have added two new lubricant flavours to this impressive line-up: Cherry and Aloe Vera. These new lubricants will give a whole new touch to oral play for couples! The products are designed to look very appealing in-store, so it will draw the attention of consumers right to them, and their competitive wholesale price will make them irresistible.Visit www.shots.nl for more information! SIGN MAGAZINE Patrick Mallaise | Director of Sales & Marketing Lange Str. 112 | (D) 27749 Delmenhorst | Tel.: 04221 – 93450 | Fax: 04221-17789 | +49(0)4221-9345-21 | Newsletter
